properties.displayName: MDE Alert - Use of living-off-the-land binary to run malicious code
properties.query:
SecurityAlert
| where ProductName == "Microsoft Defender Advanced Threat Protection"
| extend ep=parse_json(ExtendedProperties)
| extend MitreTechnique = ep.["MitreTechniques"]
| where MitreTechnique == "T1105;T1140;T1216;T1218;T1218.003;T1218.004;T1218.005;T1218.010;T1218.011;T1220"

tags.name: description
tags.value: Microsoft Defender for Endpoint Alert - Use of living-off-the-land binary to run malicious code - Attackers attempt to run malicious code undetected by loading the code in the context of common executables. Security researchers refer to this approach and a few other evasive techniques as living off the land” (LOL) and the common executables as LOL binaries or LOLBins”.  This alert indicates an anomalous attempt by a parent process to run one of these common executables using suspicious command-line parameters.
